name: Freshservice - Dark Theme
description: Based on one of the Bootstrap themes, it's an overall dark theme for Freshservice.
additional_info:
v1.6 - Fix random new selection color they added to the first row..
v1.5 - Fix the colors when viewing "All Results" from a search
v1.4 - Fix one of the header bars in the Calendar area
v1.3 - More minor color fixes
v1.2 - Small Color Fixes on the left hand menu
v1.1 - Fixed the colors for the search result page
v1.0 - Initial Release
